title: 10 Bans When? 2022?
body:
Why did the LCS get it first and us "plebs" get it later? 

Oh right, preferential treatment. 

Why do we have to wait so long before the 10 ban system is implemented?

replies.body:
Or you know, as they said when they announced it... they would implement it in pro play because they all use the new client during pro matches, so they test it with them.


They will give it to everyone else when the new client is fully released after the beta stage, that's when we get 10 bans.


Try some research guy.
